... He was opportunistic. He spent his whole campaign attacking the Bush administration and he was not a good candidate." So, had Donald Rumsfeld , the life-long Republican, actually voted for John McCain ? He frowns: I did. It was not a happy choice. The inside-Washington score-settling will strike many of the people horrified by the Iraq war as supremely beside the point.
